name: Stats Type:
description: Select your prefered way to display gameplay statistics.

name: Extra Stats:
description: Select your prefered way to display ratings, such as Sick!(s), Good(s), etc.

name: Ratings:
description: Modify the rating text. (You may encounter bugs if you select "None")

name: Stats Background
description: Adds translucent boxes under most HUD elements for better visibility.

name: Health Bar Gradient
description: Replaces the Health Bar sprite with the gradient version.

name: Time Bar Gradient
description: Replaces the Time Bar sprite with the gradient version.

name: Colored Text
description: Colors most text elements in the HUD.

name: Time Bar Icons
description: Shows or hides icons near the Time Bar.

name: Replace Combo Pop-Outs
description: Toggle between Funkin' or SaraHUD combo pop-outs.

name: Lane Underlay:
description: Adds black lanes underneath the notes, with adjustable transparency.

name: Opponent Underlay
description: Adds the Lane Underlay to the opponent's side.
